ptp:process-type.name: Axiom Analysis QC
ptp:process-type.process-type-attribute: Place samples in same shape as input samples

ptp:process-type.name: Axiom Scanning QC
ptp:process-type.process-type-attribute: Place samples in same shape as input samples

ptp:process-type.name: Denaturation and Hybridization McGill 1.0

process-output.output-name: {LIST:CSV source,GTAPR Excel file, Log file for ARR,Output Excel file,ZIP file- ARR and PROJECT}

ptp:process-type.process-type-attribute: Place samples in same shape as input samples

ptp:process-type.name: DNA Amplification McGill 1.1
ptp:process-type.process-type-attribute: Place samples in same shape as input samples

ptp:process-type.name: DNA Samples QC

parameter.name: 2.Assign Concentration from Submitted Samples
parameter.string: bash -l -c "/opt/gls/clarity/bin/java -jar /opt/gls/clarity/extensions/ngs-common/v5/EPP/ngs-extensions.jar -i {stepURI:v2:http} -u {username} -p {password} script:evaluateDynamicExpression -t false -h false -exp 'if (submittedSample.hasValue( ::Sample Conc.:: )) {output.::Concentration:: = submittedSample.::Sample Conc.::; output.::Conc. Units::=submittedSample.::Sample Conc Units::} ' -log {compoundOutputFileLuid0}"

parameter.name: 3.Assign QC flags
parameter.string: bash -l -c "/opt/gls/clarity/bin/java -jar /opt/gls/clarity/extensions/ngs-common/v5/EPP/ngs-extensions.jar -i {stepURI:v2:http} -u {username} -p {password} script:evaluateDynamicExpression -t false -h false -exp 'if (output.::Concentration:: >= step.::Concentration Threshold (ng/uL):: ) {output.QC = true} else {output.QC = false}' -log {compoundOutputFileLuid2}"

ptp:process-type.process-type-attribute: Display the UDF information associated with all the outputs

ptp:process-type.name: Fragmentation (Affy) McGill 1.0
ptp:process-type.process-type-attribute: Place samples in same shape as input samples

ptp:process-type.name: Hybridization Sample QC McGill 1.0

process-output.output-name: {LIST:Gel Image1, Absorbtion file (.asc), Log QC, QCstatus }

ptp:process-type.process-type-attribute: Place samples in same shape as input samples

parameter.name: 2. Route samples
parameter.string: bash -l -c "/opt/gls/clarity/bin/java -jar /opt/gls/clarity/extensions/ngs-common/v5/EPP/ngs-extensions.jar -i {stepURI:v2:http} -u {username} -p {password} script:evaluateDynamicExpression -t true -h false -exp 'if (output.::Go To Next Step:: == true) { nextStep = ::REPEAT:: } else { nextStep = :: DNA Amplification McGill 1.1:: }' -log {compoundOutputFileLuid2}"

parameter.name: 3. Route by python
parameter.string: bash -c "/usr/bin/python /opt/gls/clarity/customextensions/Common/route_by_template.py -u {username} -p {password} -s {stepURI:v2} -r 'Go To Next Step,False,Affymetrix Axiom Genotyping McGill 1.0,DNA Amplification McGill 1.1\nGo To Next Step,True,Sample Normalization Generic,Sample Normalization Extra Plate' -l {compoundOutputFileLuid2}"

process-output.output-name: {LIST: CSV file for robot,Normalization Log file,Mapping file }

step-property.value: 0/{LIST:Log file,Assign Report,Assign Log}|1/{LIST:Log file,Assign Report,Assign Log}|2/{LIST:Log file,Assign Report,Assign Log}
step-property.name: autoAttachFiles

step-property.value: 0/{LIST: CSV file for robot,Normalization Log file,Mapping file }|1/{LIST: CSV file for robot,Normalization Log file,Mapping file }|2/{LIST: CSV file for robot,Normalization Log file,Mapping file }
step-property.name: autoAttachFiles
